summary: An in-depth look at honeybee colonies in California, Switzerland, China and Australia.
cast: Fred Jaggi|Randolf Menzel|John Miller|Liane Singer|Heidrun Singer|Zhao Su Zhang|Fred Terry|Boris Baer|Joseph MacIlvaine|André Maritz|Layne Pauly|Robert Schneider|Eric Robinson|Elisabeth Schild|Tiffany Bate|Rodolfo Jaffe|Andrin|Barbara Baer-Imhoof|Lucien|Robert Hunger-Bühler|Charles Berling
title: Mucho más que miel: More Than Honey
